title: Settings
subtitle: Manage your personal information and preferences

classes.title: My Courses & Classes
classes.description: View all courses you are enrolled in and their class schedules
classes.noClasses: You are not enrolled in any classes yet

teacher.description: Summary of all courses you are teaching

aiModel.title: AI Model Configuration
aiModel.description: Choose which AI model provider to use for grading and chat assistance.

auto.label: Resilient (Auto)
auto.description: Prioritizes Local, falls back to Gemini if unavailable.

local.label: Local (vLLM)
local.description: Force use of local model. Privacy focused.

gemini.label: Gemini 2.5 Flash
gemini.description: Force use of Google's cloud model. Fast and reliable.
